name: The Judge (Vinicius César)
description:
The Judge

In this game you're a Skeleton Warrior, a thousand year old warrior that want to return to the living world. To do so, you need to test yours skills in the Path of The Warrior. Can you get out from the underword?

How to Play

You want to live again. To do so, you need  find the sacred KEYS by killing foes send to you. When you get the KEY you need to open the Hells Gate fast, before the times out.

On Desktops:

-Use arrow KEYS or Gamepads to move.
-Push ESC to show in game MENU.

On Mobile devices:

-Use on-screen controls
-Select help for more info.

Obs: Use the smartphone horizontally.

I hope you like this game, you can find me in twetter @vinians. Thank you.

This game was created using some asset from a fantastic guy calleed HeartBeast, you can find his tutorials on youtube. 

Can you help&nbsp ?

If you could support my work by making a donation  I would greatly appreciate it. I know that money can be tight, so please know that even $5 helps me a lot ! Let me know if you have any questions and I’ll be happy to answer them. Thank you!
